name: Cavendish Beach
description: A stunning red sand beach perfect for families, with gentle waves and nearby amenities.
seasonalTip: Visit in summer for warm weather and festivals.

name: Green Gables Heritage Place
description: Explore the historic site that inspired Anne of Green Gables, with guided tours.

name: Confederation Centre
description: A cultural hub with theater, art galleries, and historical exhibits.
